name: SystemWare
overview: Systemware, Inc. provides enterprise content management software solutions to corporations in the United States. The company offers Systemware Content Suite, an enterprise content integration and management software that allows companies to capture, store, index, manage, and access content in various formats, such as documents, emails, print streams, images, scanned images, desktop files, and electronic content. It also provides Centraspect FS, a content management software for the financial services industry that allows financial institutions and banks to manage account records, loans, and electronic statements; Centraspect HC, a content management software for the healthcare industry; and JHS, an automated SYSOUT/SYSLOG management system that is used to capture information from JES2 and JES3 spools. In addition, the company offers software implementation, migration, site assessment, and training services. It serves its clients in banking/financial services, business consulting, education, energy, government, healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, media, real estate, retail, telecommunications, and transportation sectors. Systemware, Inc. was founded in 1981 and is based in Addison, Texas with branch offices in the United States.

acquisition.source_description: CACI Completes Acquisition of SystemWare, Inc.
